attributes.action: Make EMA available to all students in further education.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Petition to make EMA (Education Maintenance Allowance) available to all students in further education regardless of household income.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Make EMA available to all students in further education."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11218.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/EDMAIN/
